item.title: #15 - High School
item.description: The Question: How much time do you spend on social media each day? The Topic: I hated high school like you cannot imagine. The Viewermail: Touched by God.

item.title: #15 - High School
item.description: the_question How much time do you spend on social media each day? Are you just obsessed with Instagram, Twitter, Facebook etc. Maybe you’re like me where you have social media, but you just unfollow everyone and you just chat to people? I like to use social media as like a news platform. Especially Reddit. But I would say I’m average. Maybe you’d like to spend less time on social media?
